sections: Motorious readers and Mustang enthusiasts alike could win this pair of Mach 1 Mustangs thanks to Dream Giveaway and CJ Pony Parts.

is a specially built example. It includes all of the goodies that are available with Fordâ€™s new Mach 1, such as the 480-horsepower 5.0-liter V8 engine, six-speed manual transmission, ebony Recaro leather trimmed seats, and a 12-speaker B&O sound system. Additionally, this Velocity Blue finished

features some special features that set it apart.  Forgeline Flow Formed Series wheels, Continental Tires ExtremeContact tires, Phoenix Graphix decals and a Classic Design Concepts Ford-approved Shaker hood scoop.
Accompanying the new Mach 1 is a, said to be one-of-one

finished in a similar fashion. Under the hood is a Ford 428-cid Cobra Jet V-8 equipped with Ram Air and a four-speed manual transmission. Finished in a rare Acapulco Blue paint, this car is an absolute dream car for the collector. Rare options include power steering and brakes, a tachometer, smoked glass, and a Traction-Lok rear end.

On top of giving away two incredible dream cars, Dream Giveaway is also throwing in $35k to cover the taxes. As always, all you have to do to be entered to win this new Mach 1, its classic counterpart, and the cash is make a charitable donation to Dream Giveaway. All proceeds go to help children and veterans in need, so you can rest assured that your donation is going to a good cause. Plus as a bonus, just for being a Motorious reader you get
when you make a donation of over $25.
